import './Favorites.css' import './Media-Query.css' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Favorites = () =>{ const { products } = useFetch() const { addToCart, removeFromFavs, favItems } = useContext(ShopContext) console.log(favItems) return(
{products.map( (product) =>{ if(favItems[product.id] > 0){ return (

Parcelamento

{product.rating}

)} return null })} {Object.values(favItems).every(quantity => quantity === 0) && (
